markdownRemark.html: The hotel and golf course is situated in a spectacular location just 20 minutes from the stunning beaches of El Palmar and Bologna. Fairplay Golf course is an 18-hole par 73 Parkland course, which features many lakes and elevated greens. It has views over the Laguna de la Janda, a former lake that is now a natural reserve and is surrounded by the Alcornocales Natural Park.

frontmatter.title: Fairplay Golf & Spa Resort
frontmatter.description: Fairplay Golf & Spa Resort - The hotel and golf course is situated in a spectacular location just 20 minutes from the stunning beaches of El Palmar and Bologna. It has views over the Laguna de la Janda, a former lake that is now a natural reserve and is surrounded by the Alcornocales Natural Park.
frontmatter.address: Calle La Torre 80, 11190 Benalup-Casas Viejas, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 68.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 66.00 euros
